alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 1:24PM CST until January 13 at 9:36PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Monroe, Dallas and Wilcox Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 68.0 feet, Millers Ferry Park begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 47.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday morning to a crest of 67.4 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
